argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsuminv.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsuminv.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsuminv.p | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsuminv.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) |
| 5 |  | gsuminv.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | gsuminv.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 7 |  | gsuminv.n | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ablcmn | |- ( G e. Abel -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 10 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 12 | 1, 3 | #P_invghm | |- ( G e. Abel <-> I e. ( G GrpHom G ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> I e. ( G GrpHom G ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ghmmhm | |- ( I e. ( G GrpHom G ) -> I e. ( G MndHom G ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> I e. ( G MndHom G ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 9, 11, 5, 15, 6, 7 | #P_gsummhm | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( I o. F ) ) = ( I ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) |
